title: Faulty Love
description: The forbidden love journey continues as Nina and Danny discover freedom and love come at a high cost that neither of them would anticipate. They must wrestle with adversities at home and beyond to keep the searing hope for revival and their flaming love alive. The cast of colorful characters that surround them experience their own journey of love and intimacy with all its bliss and blemishes. Secrets are revealed and hidden agendas uncovered. Individual and political stakes are high as conflicting motivations crash in a battle of will. Each character experiences love inspired by a unique desire for self-exploration and discovery culminating into a mixture of human drama, heightened suspense, and intrigue.Get ready for a wilder and steamier ride! Oh... and be forewarned, this book is intended for mature audiences.
author: Kaleb Kilton
